5 #include <ros/ros.h>
6 #include <nodelet/loader.h>
7 
8 int main(int argc, char **argv){
9  ros::init(argc, argv, "platooning_node");
10  nodelet::Loader nodelet;
11  nodelet::M_string remap(ros::names::getRemappings());
12  nodelet::V_string nargv;
13  std::string nodelet_name = ros::this_node::getName();
14  nodelet.load(nodelet_name, "platooning/environment_mapping", remap, nargv);
15  nodelet.load(nodelet_name, "platooning/remotecontrol", remap, nargv);
16  ros::spin();
17 
18  return 0;
19 
20 }
